string-array.name: page_text_english
string-array.item: This is the number ONE. One rabbit waves hello.
This is the number TWO. Two rabbits hop.
This is the number THREE. Three rabbits hop.
This is the number FOUR. Four rabbits hop.
This is the number FIVE. Five rabbits hop.
This is the number SIX. Six rabbits hop.
This is the number SEVEN. Seven rabbits hop.
This is the number EIGHT. Eight rabbits hop.
This is the number NINE. Nine rabbits hop.

string-array.name: page_text_russian
string-array.item: Число ОДИН. Один заяц машет лапой.
